original_text: Heman and Jeduthun were with them at the tabernacle in Gibeon. There were also other Levites that David had chosen to help them. Their special job was to give thanks to the Lord with songs, because his faithful love continues for ever. Heman and Jeduthun were with them at the tabernacle in Gibeon.
